changelog:
- Introduced E-Results page with functionality to download semester results.
- Updated navigation in main.dart to include the new E-Results route.
- Refactored URLs in attendance.dart, cie.dart, homepage.dart, and login.dart to point to the correct endpoints.
- Incremented app version to 2.1.0 and updated changelog in update.json.

stable.changelog:
- Introduced E-Results page with functionality to download semester results.

- Updated navigation in main.dart to include the new E-Results route.
- Refactored URLs in attendance.dart, cie.dart, homepage.dart, and login.dart to point to the correct endpoints.
- Incremented app version to 2.1.0 and updated changelog in update.json.

**IMPORTANT NOTE:**

THESE VERSION OF THE APP (v2.0.0/v2.0.1) CONTAINS A MINOR ISSUE WHICH PREVENTS UPDATING THE APP TO NEWER VERSIONS. KINDLY DOWNLOAD THE LATEST VERSION BY VISITING tinyurl.com/gat-contineo-app
